_context.short_desc: Data from the current execution context

items.name: current_timestamp
items.short_desc: The current timestamp as a date/time value
items.desc: The current timestamp as a date/time value

items.name: day_end
items.short_desc: The end of the day; the timestamp at midnight of the following day
items.desc: The end of the day (or start of the next day); the timestamp at midnight of the following day

items.name: day_start
items.short_desc: The start of the day; the timestamp at midnight of the current day
items.desc: The start of the day; the timestamp at midnight of the current day

items.name: timegm
items.short_desc: The number of seconds after the UNIX epoch
items.desc: The number of seconds after the UNIX epoch (`1970-01-01 UTC`)

items.name: id
items.short_desc: The internal ID of the interface
items.desc: The internal ID of the interface
